name: Bara Boarders
storyline:
You are a newbie surfer, whose been out on the waves enough times, but is aching to finally catch a wave and stay up on your board for the first time. You’re determined that today will be the day!

Thing is, you’re going to run into distractions, other handsome surfers - will they hinder or can they help you on your quest in paradise today?
summary: Bara Surfer VN Dating Game where you are a newbie surfer on an idyllic beach in Hawaii. Featuring 3 Buff Love Interests and 9 Endings.
